stages.logText: In the dungeon of the mansion I found some ghosts of prisoners. One of them told me their story.
I have agreed to help the spirits in the prison be free of the prison torturer.
I didn't want to help the spirits in the prison be free of the prison torturer.
Kotheses the torturer offered to teach me his art, as he had done for Andor before.
I accepted his offer to apprentice with him.
Kotheses gave me an Oegyth crystal.
In order to imprison the released prisoners again, I should call the demon guard by throwing an Oegyth crystal into the abyss.
Kotheses scolded me because I killed his precious demons.
I declined the offer to become his apprentice.
I told the prisoners that I had killed their torturer. Now they could get peace.
I have thrown an Oegyth crystal down into the abyss to call for the dark watch.
I got back the Oegyth crystal from the chief of the Demon guard.
I ordered the demons to watch over the prisoners.
I took my leave from Kotheses, who, incidentally, forgot to reclaim his Oegyth crystal.
Everything was in order now. The prisoners were back in their cells, and the Demon guard were on duty again.
